text: Bhanidinus kih allahako ajnapalana gara ra rasulako adesako anusarana gara. Yadi timi vimukha hunchau bhane rasulako jim'mama tyati matra cha jati uhamla'i bhani'eko cha. Ra timimathi tyasako javaphadehi cha juna timro jim'ma cha. Ra yadi rasulako adesa anusara hindne chau bhane sidha marga prapta hunecha. Ra rasulako jim'mama ta spastarupale (adesala'i) purya'idine sam'ma matra ho
